official-title.#text:
Directing the Clerk of the House of
		  Representatives to place a real time display of the United States gross
		  national debt in the House Chamber.

cosponsor.#tail:
) submitted
			 the following resolution; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Placement of National debt
			 clock on the House floor

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall place a real time display of the United States
			 gross national debt, as calculated by the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Clerk of the
			 House of Representatives
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Clerk of the House of Representatives

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, in the
			 House Chamber in clear view of the Members.

shall carry out this resolution in accordance with regulations
			 promulgated by the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Clerk of the House of Representatives

text.#text:
Whereas from 1791 to 1984, the total accumulated Federal
			 deficit was $1.5 trillion;

Whereas the projected Federal debt in 2013 is $16.8
			 trillion;

Whereas Members of Congress should be constantly reminded
			 that the gross national debt must be reduced;

Whereas the exact amount of the gross national debt will
			 be known and updated with every action affecting the amount of debt; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
will be a sign that representatives are committed to
			 reducing the national debt: Now, therefore, be it

text.#text: Whereas display of the national debt in the chamber of the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HRES 240 IH: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to place a real time display of the United States gross national debt in the House Chamber.
